name: HSCP-Rota Development
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'echo "Development environment ready!"; echo "Starting MySQL server..."; mysql.server start 2>/dev/null || brew services start mysql 2>/dev/null || echo "MySQL may already be running. Check with: ps aux | grep mysql"; echo "To set up the database, run:"; echo "  mysql -u root -e \"CREATE DATABASE hscp_rota CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;\""; echo "  mysql -u root hscp_rota < schema.sql"; echo "  mysql -u root hscp_rota -e \"SHOW TABLES;\""'
